description: Detects usage of the "wusa.exe" (Windows Update Standalone Installer) utility to extract cab using the "/extract" argument from suspicious paths
name: Wusa Extracting Cab Files From Suspicious Paths
query: (process.executable.text:*\\wusa.exe AND process.command_line.text:*\/extract\:* AND process.command_line.text:(*C\:\\Users\\Public\\* OR *\\Desktop\\* OR *\\Downloads\\* OR *\\Appdata\\Local\\Temp\\* OR *\\Windows\\Temp\\* OR *\\PerfLogs\\*))
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
